stress_test.panic_intro: ğŸ”´ Portfolio will lose 30%+ in extreme crash, entering panic zone.
stress_test.advice_beta_high: â€¢ Portfolio Beta >= 1.5, highly aggressive. Consider adding low-volatility assets (bonds, cash) to reduce risk exposure.
stress_test.advice_beta_moderate: â€¢ Portfolio Beta >= 1.2, moderately aggressive. Recommend partial profit-taking on high-Beta positions.
stress_test.advice_beta_low: â€¢ Portfolio Beta < 1.2, but still monitor single-stock concentration risk.
stress_test.advice_emergency_fund: â€¢ Ensure emergency fund is sufficient (at least 6 months living expenses).
stress_test.advice_leverage: â€¢ If using leverage or margin, maintain safety buffer to avoid forced liquidation.
stress_test.advice_thesis_broken: â€¢ Review holdings for Thesis Broken signals, prioritize reducing deteriorating positions.
stress_test.advice_warning: âš ï¸ Stress test is scenario modeling only, actual markets may be more extreme. Invest with caution.
stress_test.disclaimer: âš ï¸ This is a simplified linear CAPM model. In actual crashes, correlations approach 1 and liquidity dries up, potentially causing larger losses. This simulation is for reference only and does not constitute investment advice.
